Name: Lab Lights Override
Description: Replace facility lighting with red emergency glow.

Name: Zero Gravity Room
Description: Disable gravity in a special chamber.

Name: Nightshift Mode
Description: Completely strip your ability to see for an extra challenge!

Name: Chaos Rising
Description: Make your game harder by increasing enemy spawn count!

Name: Visual FX Pack
Description: Improve the visual artstyle of the game by introducing higher quality lighting!

Name: Mental Breakdown
Description: Make the difficulty of the game way harder
